comments:
Playing around with getting bug 18758, this was in the log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.ui 4 120 Jun 03, 2002 10:43:55.617
!MESSAGE Error logged from Debug UI: 
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException: Launch configuration does not exist.
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.createDebugException
(LaunchManager.java:440)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchManager.getInfo
(LaunchManager.java:430)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.getInfo
(LaunchConfiguration.java:335)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.getAttribute
(LaunchConfiguration.java:238)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.launchConfigurations.PerspectiveManager.getPerspec
tiveId(PerspectiveManager.java:261)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.launchConfigurations.PerspectiveManager.handleDebu
gEvents(PerspectiveManager.java:202)
	at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin.fireDebugEventSet
(DebugPlugin.java:208)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.EventDispatcher.fireEvents
(EventDispatcher.java:276)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.EventDispatcher.dispatch
(EventDispatcher.java:173)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.EventDispatcher.run
(EventDispatcher.java:202)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:536)
!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.core 4 5012 Jun 03, 2002 10:43:55.617
!MESSAGE Launch configuration does not exist.

Without a test case, this is hard to figure out.  A launch configuration gets launched that claims 
not to exist when the PerspectiveManager wants to know which perspective the config wants to 
switch to.  This is not a generally reproducible problem, so it must depend on either timing or some 
sequence of previous events, like adding, deleting or renaming configs.
